statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_type = 'fraudulent'
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_type = 'fraudulent'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 1
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC
SELECT user_id, transaction_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_amount <= 5000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_type = 'Fraudulent'
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1234;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 54321
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN fraud_detection ON transactions.transaction_id = fraud_detection.transaction_id WHERE fraud_detection.fraudulent = True
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE fraudulent_flag = true
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM fraudulent_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, COUNT(*) FROM fraudulent_transactions GROUP BY account_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE fraudulent_flag = true AND amount > 5000
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%'
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detected_fraud = true;
SELECT timestamp, location FROM FraudulentActivities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_description FROM TransactionPatterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT analysis_id, result_text, analysis_timestamp FROM AnalyzedData WHERE analysis_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detected_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, location FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM TransactionPatterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%suspicious%';
SELECT transaction_id, suspicion_level FROM SuspiciousTransactions ORDER BY suspicion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM transaction_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM users WHERE is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, action, action_date FROM audit_log ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 10 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT t.*, u.username AS user_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.*, p.pattern_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_patterns p ON t.amount > 1000 AND t.is_fraudulent = FALSE AND p.pattern_type = 'Anomaly' ORDER BY t.transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, a.action, a.action_date FROM audit_log a INNER JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.action_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY a.action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
